abstract: The Treasury Department is moving to provide Bank of America billions of dollars in additional aid as the bank struggles with mounting losses at Merrill Lynch, which it recently acquired, a person briefed on the talks said Wednesday, The New York Times’s Julie Creswell reports.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department is moving to provide Bank of America billions of dollars in additional aid as the bank struggles with mounting losses at Merrill Lynch, which it recently acquired, a person briefed on the talks said Wednesday, The New York Times’s Julie Creswell reports.

headline.main: Bank of America May Receive More Bailout Money
